ai-dlex:Account.comment: Captures identifying information about an account.  The Account class is an extension to NIST-7693 that was \"missing\". The relationship with other Account classes from other ontologies will likely be established here.
ai-dlex:Account.label: Account
ai-dlex:Account.name: Account

ai-dlex:Appliance.comment: Defines identifying information about a network appliance device.
ai-dlex:Appliance.label: Appliance
ai-dlex:Appliance.name: Appliance

ai-dlex:ApplicationSoftware.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of application software.
ai-dlex:ApplicationSoftware.label: Application Software
ai-dlex:ApplicationSoftware.name: ApplicationSoftware

ai-dlex:ComputerAccount.comment: Captures identifying infornmation about an account on a conputer.
ai-dlex:ComputerAccount.label: Computer Account
ai-dlex:ComputerAccount.name: ComputerAccount

ai-dlex:DirectoryServer.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a system that stores, organizes and provides access to directory information in order to unify network resources.
ai-dlex:DirectoryServer.label: Directory Server
ai-dlex:DirectoryServer.name: DirectoryServer

ai-dlex:DnsServer.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a system that resolves domain names to internet protocol (IP) addresses.
ai-dlex:DnsServer.label: DNS Server
ai-dlex:DnsServer.name: DnsServer

ai-dlex:EmailServer.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a system that sends and receives electronic mail messages.
ai-dlex:EmailServer.label: Email Server
ai-dlex:EmailServer.name: EmailServer

ai-dlex:Firewall.comment: Defines identifying information about a network firewall device.
ai-dlex:Firewall.label: Network Firewall
ai-dlex:Firewall.name: Firewall

ai-dlex:Guidance.comment: Defines identifying information about any guideline or recommendation.
ai-dlex:Guidance.label: Guidance
ai-dlex:Guidance.name: Guidance

ai-dlex:Plan.comment: Defines identifying information about an applicable plan.
ai-dlex:Plan.label: Plan
ai-dlex:Plan.name: Plan

ai-dlex:Policy.comment: Defines identifying information about an enforceable policy.
ai-dlex:Policy.label: Policy
ai-dlex:Policy.name: Policy

ai-dlex:Procedure.comment: Defines identifying information about a list of steps or actions to take to achieve some end result.
ai-dlex:Procedure.label: Procedure
ai-dlex:Procedure.name: Procedure

ai-dlex:Router.comment: Defines identifying information about a network router device.
ai-dlex:Router.label: Network Router
ai-dlex:Router.name: Router

ai-dlex:Server.comment: Defines identifying information about infrastructure server device that perform generic computing capabilities.
ai-dlex:Server.label: Infrastructure Server
ai-dlex:Server.name: Server

ai-dlex:ServiceAccount.comment: Captures identifying information about a special type of computer account that is not used by a human, is privileged, and often used to executre applications, run automated services, virtual machine instances and other processes.
ai-dlex:ServiceAccount.label: Service Account
ai-dlex:ServiceAccount.name: ServiceAccount

ai-dlex:Standard.comment: Defines identifying information about any organizational or industry standard.
ai-dlex:Standard.label: Standard
ai-dlex:Standard.name: Standard

ai-dlex:StorageArray.comment: Defines identifying information about a storage array device.
ai-dlex:StorageArray.label: Storage Array
ai-dlex:StorageArray.name: StorageArray

ai-dlex:Switch.comment: Defines identifying information about a network switch device.
ai-dlex:Switch.label: Network Switch
ai-dlex:Switch.name: Switch

ai-dlex:UserAccount.comment: Captures identifying information about a user account on a conputer.
ai-dlex:UserAccount.label: User Account
ai-dlex:UserAccount.name: UserAccount

ai-dlex:Validation.comment: Defines identifying information about an external assessment performed on some other component, that has been validated by a third-party.
ai-dlex:Validation.label: Validation
ai-dlex:Validation.name: Validation

ai-dlex:validation_reference.comment: Identifies the validating body's assigned identifier for their validation of this component.
ai-dlex:validation_reference.name: validation_reference

ai-dlex:validation_type.comment: Identifies a well-known name for a kind of validation.
ai-dlex:validation_type.name: validation_type

ai-dlex:VoIPHandset.comment: Defines identifying information about a Voice over IP handset or phone device.
ai-dlex:VoIPHandset.label: VoIP Handset
ai-dlex:VoIPHandset.name: VoIPHandset

ai-dlex:VoIPRouter.comment: Defines identifying information about a VoIP router device.
ai-dlex:VoIPRouter.label: Voice over IP Router
ai-dlex:VoIPRouter.name: VoIPRouter

ai-dlex:WebServer.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a system that delivers content or services to end users over the Internet or an intranet.
ai-dlex:WebServer.label: Web Server
ai-dlex:WebServer.name: WebServer

ai-dlex:Workstation.comment: Defines identifying information about a workstation that perform generic computing capabilities.
ai-dlex:Workstation.label: Workstation
ai-dlex:Workstation.name: Workstation

ai:Asset.comment: Defines identifying information about an asset in it generic form as something of value.
ai:Asset.label: Asset
ai:Asset.name: Asset

ai:asset_id.comment: Identifies the asset identifier assigned to the asset by an organization.
ai:asset_id.label: Asset ID
ai:asset_id.name: asset_id

ai:description.comment: Specifies a short human-readable description about the asset.
ai:description.label: Description
ai:description.name: description

ai:locations.comment: Identifies the references to a set of location, typically facilites, at which this asset, component, or system is located.
ai:locations.label: Locations
ai:locations.name: locations

ai:name.comment: Identifies the name of the entity.
ai:name.label: Name
ai:name.name: name

ai:responsible_parties.comment: Captures a reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role in the context of the containing object.
ai:responsible_parties.label: Responsible Parties
ai:responsible_parties.name: responsible_parties

ai:Circuit.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a network circuit.
ai:Circuit.label: Circuit
ai:Circuit.name: Circuit

ai:circuit_name.comment: Identifies the name of the circuit.
ai:circuit_name.label: Circuit Name
ai:circuit_name.name: circuit_name

ai:network_termination_point.comment: Identifies the network that acts as the termination point of a circuit.
ai:network_termination_point.label: Network Termination Point
ai:network_termination_point.name: network_termination_point

ai:service_provider.comment: Identifies the organization that owns/operates the circuit.
ai:service_provider.label: Service Provider
ai:service_provider.name: service_provider

ai:termination_device.comment: Identifies the device which terminiates the circuit.
ai:termination_device.label: Termination Device
ai:termination_device.name: termination_device

ai:ComputingDevice.comment: Defines identifying information about a hardware device that perform generic computing capabilities.
ai:ComputingDevice.label: Computing Device
ai:ComputingDevice.name: ComputingDevice

ai:bios_id.comment: Identifies the unique identifier associated with the motherboard of the device.
ai:bios_id.label: BIOS ID
ai:bios_id.name: bios_id

ai:connected_to_network.comment: Identifies the network to which the asset is connected.
ai:connected_to_network.label: Connect to Network
ai:connected_to_network.name: connected_to_network

ai:fqdn.comment: Identifies the fully-qualified domain name for the computing device being identified.
ai:fqdn.label: Fully-Qualified Domain Name
ai:fqdn.name: fqdn

ai:hostname.comment: Identifies the hostname of the computing device.
ai:hostname.label: Hostname
ai:hostname.name: hostname

ai:installed_hardware.comment: Identifies references to hardware installed on the asset.
ai:installed_hardware.label: Installed Hardware
ai:installed_hardware.name: installed_hardware

ai:installed_operating_system.comment: Identifies references to the operating system installed on the asset.
ai:installed_operating_system.label: Installed Operating System
ai:installed_operating_system.name: installed_operating_system

ai:installed_software.comment: Identifies references to the software installed on the asset.
ai:installed_software.label: Installed Software
ai:installed_software.name: installed_software

ai:ip_address.comment: Identifies the IP Address, in either V4 or V6 format, for the associated entity.
ai:ip_address.label: IP Address
ai:ip_address.name: ip_address

ai:is_publicly_accessible.comment: Identifies whether the asset is publicly accessible.
ai:is_publicly_accessible.label: Publicly Accessible
ai:is_publicly_accessible.name: is_publicly_accessible

ai:is_scanned.comment: Identifies whether the asses is the asset subjected to network scans.
ai:is_scanned.label: Scanned
ai:is_scanned.name: is_scanned

ai:is_virtual.comment: Identifies whether the asset is virtualized.
ai:is_virtual.label: Is Virtual
ai:is_virtual.name: is_virtual

ai:mac_address.comment: Identifies the Media Access Control (MAC) address, a unique identifier assigned to a network interface controller (NIC) for use as a network address in communications within a network segment.
ai:mac_address.label: MAC Address
ai:mac_address.name: mac_address

ai:netbios_name.comment: Identifies the NetBIOS name associated with the device.
ai:netbios_name.label: NetBios Name
ai:netbios_name.name: netbios_name

ai:uri.comment: Identifies a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the asset.
ai:uri.label: URI
ai:uri.name: uri

ai:vlan_id.comment: Identifies the virtual LAN identifier of the asset.
ai:vlan_id.label: Virtual LAN ID
ai:vlan_id.name: vlan_id

ai:Data.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of data.
ai:Data.label: Data
ai:Data.name: Data

ai:Database.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of electronic collection of data, or information, that is specially organized for rapid search and retrieval.
ai:Database.label: Database
ai:Database.name: Database

ai:instance_name.comment: Identifies the name of the database instance.
ai:instance_name.label: Instance Name
ai:instance_name.name: instance_name

ai:served_by.comment: Identifies the service that is serves the database or website.
ai:served_by.label: Served By
ai:served_by.name: served_by

ai:DocumentaryAsset.comment: Defines identifying information about a documentary asset, such as policies, procedures.
ai:DocumentaryAsset.label: Documentary Asset
ai:DocumentaryAsset.name: DocumentaryAsset

ai:Hardware.comment: Defines identifying information about a tangible or physical asset used to provide physical protections or countermeasures.
ai:Hardware.label: Hardware
ai:Hardware.name: Hardware

ai:baseline_configuration_name.comment: Identifies the name of the baseline configuration for the asset.
ai:baseline_configuration_name.label: Baseline Configuration Name
ai:baseline_configuration_name.name: baseline_configuration_name

ai:cpe_identifier.comment: Identifies the Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) identifier for the computing device being identified. This MUST be a hardware CPE. This MUST be a CPE 2.2 URI [CPE22] or CPE 2.3 formatted string [CPE23].
ai:cpe_identifier.label: CPE ID
ai:cpe_identifier.name: cpe_identifier

ai:function.comment: Identifies the function provided by the asset for the system.
ai:function.label: Function
ai:function.name: function

ai:installation_id.comment: Identifies the identifier associated with the installation as defined by an oranization.
ai:installation_id.label: Installation ID
ai:installation_id.name: installation_id

ai:installed_hardware.comment: Identifies references to hardware installed on the asset.
ai:installed_hardware.label: Installed Hardware
ai:installed_hardware.name: installed_hardware

ai:installed_operating_system.comment: Identifies references to the operating system installed on the asset.
ai:installed_operating_system.label: Installed Operating System
ai:installed_operating_system.name: installed_operating_system

ai:model.comment: Identifies the model of the hardware asset.
ai:model.label: Hardware Model
ai:model.name: model

ai:motherboard_id.comment: Identifies the motherboard unique identifier of the computing device
ai:motherboard_id.label: Motherboard ID
ai:motherboard_id.name: motherboard_id

ai:IpAddress.comment: Defines identifying information about an IP Address.
ai:IpAddress.label: IP Address
ai:IpAddress.name: IpAddress

ai:ending_ip_address.comment: Identifies the ending IP Address in a range.
ai:ending_ip_address.label: Ending IP Address
ai:ending_ip_address.name: ending_ip_address

ai:ip_address_value.comment: Identifies the value of the IP Address.
ai:ip_address_value.label: IP Address Value
ai:ip_address_value.name: ip_address_value

ai:starting_ip_address.comment: Identifies the starting IP Address in a range.
ai:starting_ip_address.label: Starting IP Address
ai:starting_ip_address.name: starting_ip_address

ai:IpAddressRange.comment: Defines identifying information about a range of IP Addresses.
ai:IpAddressRange.label: IP Address Range
ai:IpAddressRange.name: IpAddressRange

ai:starting_ip_address.comment: Identifies the starting IP Address in a range.
ai:starting_ip_address.label: Starting IP Address
ai:starting_ip_address.name: starting_ip_address

ai:IpV4Address.comment: Defines identifying information about an IP V4 Address
ai:IpV4Address.label: IPv4 Address
ai:IpV4Address.name: IpV4Address

ai:IpV6Address.comment: Defines identifying information about an IP V6 Address
ai:IpV6Address.label: IPv6 Address
ai:IpV6Address.name: IpV6Address

ai:ItAsset.comment: Defines identifying information about an asset that is technology-based, such as hardware, software, and networking.
ai:ItAsset.label: IT Asset
ai:ItAsset.name: ItAsset

ai:asset_tag.comment: Identifies the asset tag assigned to the asset.
ai:asset_tag.label: Asset Tag
ai:asset_tag.name: asset_tag

ai:asset_type.comment: Simple indication of the asset's function, such as Router, Storage Array, DNS Server.
ai:asset_type.label: Asset Type
ai:asset_type.name: asset_type

ai:operational_status.comment: Identifies the operational status of the asset.
ai:operational_status.label: Operational Satus
ai:operational_status.name: operational_status

ai:release_date.comment: Identifies the date the component was released, such as a software release date or policy publication date.
ai:release_date.label: Release Date
ai:release_date.name: release_date

ai:serial_number.comment: Identifies the serial number for the asset.
ai:serial_number.label: Serial Number
ai:serial_number.name: serial_number

ai:vendor_name.comment: Identifies the name of the vendor that manufactured the asset.
ai:vendor_name.label: Vendor Name
ai:vendor_name.name: vendor_name

ai:version.comment: Identifies the version of the asset.
ai:version.label: Version
ai:version.name: version

ai:LocationPoint.comment: Defines identifying information about a geospatical location.
ai:LocationPoint.label: LocationPoint
ai:LocationPoint.name: LocationPoint

ai:elevation.comment: Identifies the elevation of the point, represented in meters above sea level of a specific geographic location.
ai:elevation.label: Elevation
ai:elevation.name: elevation

ai:latitude.comment: Identifies the latitude of a specific geographic point represented as a number between -90 and 90.
ai:latitude.label: Latitude
ai:latitude.name: latitude

ai:longitude.comment: Identifies the longitude of a specific geographic point, represented as a number between -180 and 180.
ai:longitude.label: Longitude
ai:longitude.name: longitude

ai:radius.comment: Identifies the radius of a horizontal circle centered on a geographical point.
ai:radius.label: Radius
ai:radius.name: radius

ai:LocationRegion.comment: Defines identifying information about a geographic region.
ai:LocationRegion.label: LocationRegion
ai:LocationRegion.name: LocationRegion

ai:region_name.comment: Identifies the name of the region.
ai:region_name.name: region_name

ai:MACAddress.comment: Defined identifying information about a MAC Address.
ai:MACAddress.label: MAC Address
ai:MACAddress.name: MACAddress

ai:mac_address_value.comment: Identifies the value of the MAC Address.
ai:mac_address_value.label: MAC Address Value
ai:mac_address_value.name: mac_address_value

ai:Network.comment: Defines identifying information about a network.
ai:Network.label: Network
ai:Network.name: Network

ai:network_address_range.comment: Identifies the IP address range of the network either in range of IP Address in CIDR (Classless Inter-Domain Routing) notation or as a set of starting and ending IP addresses.
ai:network_address_range.label: Network Address Range
ai:network_address_range.name: network_address_range

ai:network_id.comment: Identifies the network identifier of the asset.
ai:network_id.label: Network ID
ai:network_id.name: network_id

ai:network_name.comment: Identifies the name of the network being identified.
ai:network_name.label: Network Name
ai:network_name.name: network_name

ai:NetworkDevice.comment: Defines identifying information about a network device.
ai:NetworkDevice.label: NetworkDevice
ai:NetworkDevice.name: NetworkDevice

ai:connected_to_network.comment: Identifies the network to which the asset is connected.
ai:connected_to_network.label: Connect to Network
ai:connected_to_network.name: connected_to_network

ai:ip_address.comment: Identifies the IP Address, in either V4 or V6 format, for the associated entity.
ai:ip_address.label: IP Address
ai:ip_address.name: ip_address

ai:is_publicly_accessible.comment: Identifies whether the asset is publicly accessible.
ai:is_publicly_accessible.label: Publicly Accessible
ai:is_publicly_accessible.name: is_publicly_accessible

ai:is_scanned.comment: Identifies whether the asses is the asset subjected to network scans.
ai:is_scanned.label: Scanned
ai:is_scanned.name: is_scanned

ai:is_virtual.comment: Identifies whether the asset is virtualized.
ai:is_virtual.label: Is Virtual
ai:is_virtual.name: is_virtual

ai:mac_address.comment: Identifies the Media Access Control (MAC) address, a unique identifier assigned to a network interface controller (NIC) for use as a network address in communications within a network segment.
ai:mac_address.label: MAC Address
ai:mac_address.name: mac_address

ai:uri.comment: Identifies a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the asset.
ai:uri.label: URI
ai:uri.name: uri

ai:vlan_id.comment: Identifies the virtual LAN identifier of the asset.
ai:vlan_id.label: Virtual LAN ID
ai:vlan_id.name: vlan_id

ai:OperatingSystem.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of operating system software.
ai:OperatingSystem.label: Operating System
ai:OperatingSystem.name: OperatingSystem

ai:Organization.comment: Defines identifying information about an instances of an organization.
ai:Organization.label: Organization
ai:Organization.name: Organization

ai:email_address.comment: Identifies the email address associated with the organization being identified.
ai:email_address.label: Email Address
ai:email_address.name: email_address

ai:organization_name.comment: Identifies the name of the organization
ai:organization_name.label: Organization Name
ai:organization_name.name: organization_name

ai:telephone_number.comment:
""Identifies the  telephone number associated with a party.\r
For a North American number, the number must in the format '+1 XXX-XXX-XXXX' where X is a digit.\r
For an international number, the number must begin with a '+' symbol, followed by 7 to 15 digits. A space may be used between digits, as appropriate.""
ai:telephone_number.label: Telephone Number
ai:telephone_number.name: telephone_number

ai:Person.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a person
ai:Person.label: Person
ai:Person.name: Person

ai:email_address.comment: Identifies the email address associated with the organization being identified.
ai:email_address.label: Email Address
ai:email_address.name: email_address

ai:part_of.comment: Identifies a party that is part of an organization
ai:part_of.label: Part of
ai:part_of.name: part_of

ai:person_name.comment: Identifies the name of a person
ai:person_name.label: Person Name
ai:person_name.name: person_name

ai:telephone_number.comment:
""Identifies the  telephone number associated with a party.\r
For a North American number, the number must in the format '+1 XXX-XXX-XXXX' where X is a digit.\r
For an international number, the number must begin with a '+' symbol, followed by 7 to 15 digits. A space may be used between digits, as appropriate.""
ai:telephone_number.label: Telephone Number
ai:telephone_number.name: telephone_number

ai:Port.comment: Defines identifying information abotu a network port.
ai:Port.label: Port
ai:Port.name: Port

ai:PortRange.comment: Defines identifying information about a ranges of ports.
ai:PortRange.label: PortRange
ai:PortRange.name: PortRange

ai:starting_port.comment: Identifies the starting port number in a range.
ai:starting_port.label: starting_port
ai:starting_port.name: starting_port

ai:ResponsibleParty.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a party with responsibility for performing a function relative to the containing object.
ai:ResponsibleParty.label: ResponsibleParty
ai:ResponsibleParty.name: ResponsibleParty

ai:role_identifier.comment: Identifies the role that is responsible for the business function.
ai:role_identifier.label: Role Identifier
ai:role_identifier.name: role_identifier

ai:function.label: Function
ai:function.name: function

ai:ip_address.label: IP Address
ai:ip_address.name: ip_address

ai:is_scanned.label: Scanned

ai:service_software.comment: Identifies the software being executed by the service.
ai:service_software.label: Service Sofware
ai:service_software.name: service_software

ai:Software.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of software.
ai:Software.label: Software
ai:Software.name: Software

ai:cpe_identifier.comment: Identifies the Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) identifier for the computing device being identified. This MUST be a hardware CPE. This MUST be a CPE 2.2 URI [CPE22] or CPE 2.3 formatted string [CPE23].
ai:cpe_identifier.label: CPE ID
ai:cpe_identifier.name: cpe_identifier

ai:installation_id.comment: Identifies the identifier associated with the installation as defined by an oranization.
ai:installation_id.label: Installation ID
ai:installation_id.name: installation_id

ai:license_key.comment: Identifies the license key associated with the software installation.
ai:license_key.label: License Key
ai:license_key.name: license_key

ai:patch_level.comment: The specific patch level of the asset.
ai:patch_level.label: Patch Level
ai:patch_level.name: patch_level

ai:software_identifier.comment: Identifies the Software Identifier (SWID) for the computing device being identified.
ai:software_identifier.label: Software Identifier
ai:software_identifier.name: software_identifier

ai:System.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of an information system.
ai:System.label: System
ai:System.name: System

ai:baseline_configuration_name.comment: Identifies the name of the baseline configuration for the asset.
ai:baseline_configuration_name.label: Baseline Configuration Name

ai:connected_to_network.comment: Identifies the network to which the asset is connected.
ai:connected_to_network.label: Connect to Network

ai:function.label: Function

ai:is_publicly_accessible.label: Publicly Accessible
ai:is_publicly_accessible.name: is_publicly_accessible

ai:system_name.comment: Identifies the name associated with the system.
ai:system_name.label: System Name

ai:Website.comment: Defines identifying information about an instance of a website.
ai:Website.label: Website
ai:Website.name: Website

ai:document_root.comment: Identifies the absolute path to the document root location of the website on the host.
ai:document_root.label: Document Root
ai:document_root.name: document_root

ai:locale.comment: Identifies the locale of the website represented as an RFC 5646 language, and optionally, region code. Language and region codes SHOULD be in the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Language Subtag Registry [ILSR].
ai:locale.label: Locale
ai:locale.name: locale

ai:served_by.comment: Identifies the service that is serves the database or website.
ai:served_by.label: Served By

ai:website_url.comment: Identifies the URL of the website.
